name: PABA (Under Development)
description:
Programmer Art Battle Arena

is a 4 Player Battle Arena with bad Graphics and Screen Shake

it was created during Train Jam 2015 by me

since I did not have an artist in hand, all the "art" in the game is done by me

please use 4 controllers to play

I twitch (or youtube) stream development from time to time, please leave your comments here so I can get better feedback on what to work on.

You can download it for free or donate if you would like.

Changes in v0.0002 :

- 4 players instead of 2

- better looking floor

- smoke trails when moving

- circular hazards for distinction

Planned Development:

- Choose 2 - 3 - 4 players at the start of the game

- dashing?

- Items?

- You tell me.
